name: King & Keeper
description:
Do you dare to challenge the King?
Are you fast enough to avoid the king's deadly blows?
The King is Hungry and angry so watch out for his Roar!
Help Meano the Keeper evade the Paws and Jaws of the King and stop him from getting the Meat.
Evade, Jump, flip and taunt the King into submission


Completely free to play!
Colorful and brilliant HD Graphics
Unlock special Achievements
Unlock special moves as you progress
Challenge friends and family
Get on top of the Leader boards and become the King of Keepers.
King and Keeper is localized in 10 languages!
Exciting features planned for upcoming builds

For suggestions and comments please contact us at - support@zealcity.com

Please feel free to like our Facebook page - facebook.com/kingandkeeper
Consider following us on twitter - @zealcity
